Spanish.text: El perro corre rápido.
Spanish.translation: The dog runs fast.
Spanish.pronounce: el peh-roh koh-reh rah-pee-doh

Spanish.text: La escuela está en la ciudad.
Spanish.translation: The school is in the city.
Spanish.pronounce: lah es-kweh-lah es-tah en lah syoo-dad

Spanish.text: Mi hermana estudia en la biblioteca.
Spanish.translation: My sister studies in the library.
Spanish.pronounce: mee ehr-mah-nah es-too-dyah en lah bee-blee-oh-teh-kah

Spanish.text: El hombre alto lee un libro.
Spanish.translation: The tall man reads a book.
Spanish.pronounce: el ohm-breh al-toh leh-eh un lee-broh

Spanish.text: El coche es azul.
Spanish.translation: The car is blue.
Spanish.pronounce: el koh-cheh es ah-sool

Spanish.text: La mujer está feliz hoy.
Spanish.translation: The woman is happy today.
Spanish.pronounce: lah moo-hehr es-tah feh-lees oy

Spanish.text: El amigo de Juan juega al fútbol.
Spanish.translation: Juan's friend plays soccer.
Spanish.pronounce: el ah-mee-goh deh hwan hoo-eh-gah al foot-bohl

Spanish.text: El niño pequeño corre en el parque.
Spanish.translation: The small child runs in the park.
Spanish.pronounce: el nee-nyoh peh-keh-nyoh koh-reh en el par-keh

Spanish.text: El gato duerme en la casa.
Spanish.translation: The cat sleeps in the house.
Spanish.pronounce: el gah-toh dwehr-meh en lah kah-sah

Spanish.text: Tengo que escribir una carta.
Spanish.translation: I have to write a letter.
Spanish.pronounce: ten-goh keh es-kree-beer oo-nah kar-tah

Spanish.text: Ella habla con su madre por teléfono.
Spanish.translation: She talks to her mother on the phone.
Spanish.pronounce: eh-yah ah-blah kon soo mah-dreh por teh-leh-foh-noh

Spanish.text: Vamos a comer en la noche.
Spanish.translation: We are going to eat at night.
Spanish.pronounce: vah-mos ah koh-mehr en lah noh-cheh

Spanish.text: Mi padre escucha música en el coche.
Spanish.translation: My father listens to music in the car.
Spanish.pronounce: mee pah-dreh es-koo-chah moo-see-kah en el koh-cheh

Spanish.text: Nosotros caminamos hacia la escuela.
Spanish.translation: We walk toward the school.
Spanish.pronounce: noh-soh-tros kah-mee-nah-mos ah-syah lah es-kweh-lah

Spanish.text: Ellos estudian juntos cada día.
Spanish.translation: They study together every day.
Spanish.pronounce: eh-yos es-too-dyan hoon-tos kah-dah dee-ah

Spanish.text: ¿Puedes jugar conmigo en el parque?
Spanish.translation: Can you play with me in the park?
Spanish.pronounce: pweh-des hoo-gar kon-mee-goh en el par-keh

Spanish.text: El coche rojo es muy rápido.
Spanish.translation: The red car is very fast.
Spanish.pronounce: el koh-cheh roh-hoh es moo-ee rah-pee-doh

Spanish.text: La familia tiene una casa grande.
Spanish.translation: The family has a big house.
Spanish.pronounce: lah fah-mee-lee-ah tee-eh-neh oo-nah kah-sah grahn-deh

Spanish.text: El perro duerme en la cama pequeña.
Spanish.translation: The dog sleeps in the small bed.
Spanish.pronounce: el peh-roh dwehr-meh en lah kah-mah peh-keh-nyah

Spanish.text: Me gusta leer por la noche.
Spanish.translation: I like to read at night.
Spanish.pronounce: meh goo-stah leh-ehr por lah noh-cheh
